mapper.select: Select s.id as subject_id, s.name as subject_name, s.room_type_needed as subject_room_type, spw.id as subject_per_week_id, spw.class_id as subject_per_week_class_id, spw.subject_id as subject_per_week_subject_id, spw.count as subject_per_week_count, c.id as class.id, c.name as class_name from subjects s inner join subject_per_week spw on spw.subject_id = s.id inner join classes c on spw.class_id = c.id
